original_text: The same hour was the thing fulfilled upon Nebuchadnezzar: and he was driven from men, and did eat grass as oxen, and his body was wet with the dew of heaven, till his hairs were grown like eagles' feathers, and his nails like birds' claws.
korean_text: 바로 그 때에 이 일이 나 느부갓네살에게 응하므로 내가 사람에게 쫓겨나서 소처럼 풀을 먹으며 몸이 하늘 이슬에 젖고 머리털이 독수리 털과 같이 자랐고 손톱은 새 발톱과 같이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: The same hour was the thing fulfilled
and he was driven from men
and did eat grass as oxen
and his body was wet with the dew of heaven
till his hairs were grown like eagles' feathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리카락이 독수리 깃털처럼 자랄 때까지

sentences.original_text: and his nails like birds' claws
